title: Diana Lunar Goddess (Bug?) (art mess up?)
body:
>_< I don't have a picture since its hard to get her orbs in a screenshot considering they move faster and proc faster, but recently Diana especially in her Lunar Goddess skin has had her orbs begin in square shapes not orbs. Now it doesn't effect gameplay or her W in general its just the art and the flow of the skin, usually when im heading in a creep wave and press W the orbs will be boxes (mainly the two behind me) while one infront is a orb. 

It's pretty small and probably unimportant :3 but I just wanted to let everyone know! <3 I love my Diana {{champion:131}}

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! 

This is a known issue that's due to improper shadowing on her orbs.
